p: The infection further gets disseminated through the bloodstream to the adjacent lymph nodes and other body organs such as myocardium, central nervous system, skeletal muscles, and to the fetus. Viral replication in astroglia and neuronal cells of infected mice brain causes neuronal degeneration, cellular infiltration, and alleviation in the brain, thus explaining ZIKV neurotropism and the related neurological complications (microcephaly in congenital ZIKV infection).[ 17]
